title: Investor (IVY, Nine Spar)
summary:
▪️My Mission is to build a full stack global startup ecosystem right from Incorporation to funding covering equity and debt.

▪️I am a second generation Entrepreneur aged 26 at Rachit Group headquartered in Surat predominantly into the textiles industry since 1992. We are one of the market leaders in manufacturing wide range of textile fabrics and designer ethnic wear for women, serving to premium retailers and wholesalers across PAN India and 10+ countries to the likes of Manyavar, Kalki Fashion etc.

▪️I am Co-Founder at IVY Growth Associates. We’re a sector agnostic Angel Network & MicroVC having 30+ Shareholders and 300+ Angel Investors with over 65+ Investments incl. Zypp, Blusmart etc.

▪️I am Director at MI Capital based in Dubai. We are a comprehensive financial services & a boutique investment banking firm supporting businesses globally.

▪️ I am Co-Founder at Funding Possibilities Dubai alongside 6+ CXO’s. We’re building a Fintech platform to facilitate Equity, Debt and M&A deals. 

▪️I am Partner at JB Ventures, leading conglomerate’s micro fund having 10+ Investments with notable names like We Founder Circle - EvolveX, Escrowpay etc.

▪️I am Partner at Nine Spar Partners, a micro fund having over 20+ Professionals/CXO’s with 30+ Investments to the likes of ReshaMandi, Vedantu etc.

▪️Our family office has invested in 20+ companies with notable names like 9Unicorns, Sapio Analytics etc, making a group collective total of 100+ Investments and 5M$ AUM.

▪️We, at IVY hosted one of India’s largest startup annual summit in Surat by the name 21 by 72 with over 8000+ footfall spanning across 3 days. We have also hosted micro events in Mumbai, Dubai, London etc. 

▪️I am a Member at global organisations like TiE, IoD London and Dubai Young Professionals.

▪️I have been recognised by Times 40U40 Surat award, Entrepreneurs Today 30U30, Indian Achievers Award 2021.

▪️I have been featured in YourStory, BusinessWorld, BusinessStandard, ET, VCCircle, TOI etc.

▪️I have pursued my bachelors and masters degree from University of Wolverhampton in BA(Hons.) Business management at Mumbai campus & University of Westminster, London in M.Sc Entrepreneurship, Innovation & Enterprise Development respectively. Further, I have also accomplished an ExecEd Alumni status from London Business School in Corporate Finance.

▪️My prestigious certifications include Oxford Summer course, SPJIMR, IIM-A, HBS etc.

▪️I am a traveller by passion with visits to over 30 countries and 100 cities and achievements of sky dive and scuba dive.
name: Rachit Poddar

title: CRO
summary: Business Analyst with 2.7 years of experience keen in developing solutions to optimize conversion rate and enhance customer experience while generating more revenue, with the following key skills - Advanced excel, Basic SQL, Google analytics (GA4), Hotjar, Convert, Hubspot. name: Sricharan B

title: Head Of Laboratory
summary:
Research Experience :
1. Pro-neurotrophins/p75 NTR signalling contributes to increased apoptosis in the preterm placentae, funded by DST India.

2. Characterization of strain In(1)BM2 (reinerted) of Drosophila melanogaster.
I have conducted experiments on Temperature-induced alteration of the polytene X chromosome structure in male larvae.I have experience in maintenance of Drosophila cultures, polytene chromosome preparation, RT-PCR.

3. “Characterization of Plant Defensive Proteins and Testing Their Efficacy on Helicoverpa armigera for Plant Protection” from Division of Biochemical Sciences, National Chemical Laboratory, Pune, during September2011- April 12. In this work the two plant defensive proteins rCanPI-7 and Cry1EC were isolated, purified and characterized  and efficacy of rCanPI-7 was studied by both In-vitro and In-vivo, on Helicoverpa armigera. The result shows the decrease in growth of Helicoverpa armigera.

4. “Antimicrobial Effect of Commercial Mouthwashes on Staphylococcus epidermidis and Lactobacillus acidophilus An In-vitro study” at Spicer Memorial College, Pune during October 2008-April 2009. In this study, the effects of three different commercially available mouthwashes were studied on two oral bacteria.
name: sonal chavan

title: Chief Science Officer
summary: Solving aging, because it's the most complex puzzle in Biology.
titleDescription: Decode Age is incepted as the pioneer of Longevity Research in India, which focuses on a range of Biotech based products, healthcare testing services, and Longevity Biomarker Research to accelerate the development of therapeutics and interventions in Longevity and Healthy Ageing Sciences. The sole mission of the company is to make people live a long and healthy life, with no compromises on the average health span. Decode Age dedicates the full potential of its R&D prowess to uncoil the complexity and interactions of various biomarkers that contribute to ageing. Decode Age envisions a world where older generations maintain vitality, vigour, and cognition, helping our species escape the inevitability of age-associated chronic diseases and imminent Silver Tsunami.
name: Darshit Patel

title: Co-Founder CEO
summary:
Driving the mission to make "80 the new 50," I lead Decode Age, India's first and pioneering longevity company, at the intersection of biotech, health tech, and personalized wellness. With a passion for transforming health outcomes through cutting-edge science, I guide our marketing and business strategy to reshape ageing solutions for healthier, longer lives.

At Decode Age, we bring together advanced diagnostics, supplements, and personalized health plans—designed to empower individuals to proactively manage their healthspan. Our innovations are backed by research and collaborations with leading health institutions, aiming to make longevity science accessible and impactful for all.

Background: With extensive experience in building and scaling tech-driven businesses, I previously exited a successful venture and founded a telecommunications company. Now, I channel my expertise into creating tangible solutions that address the universal challenge of healthy ageing.

We are expanding globally, with a vision to lead the longevity ecosystem—redefining age so that life remains vibrant and fulfilling at every stage.

title: Scientific Advisor
summary:
Data Science and Computational Biology leader with over 10 years of experience using in-depth knowledge in computational biology, bioinformatics, and machine learning to advance research and clinical development projects. Highly effective in building teams, systems, and infrastructures to facilitate the analysis of large and complex sets of genomic and metagenomic data that drive product development and commercial initiatives. Influencing leader with the ability to communicate with technical and non-technical stakeholders and build consensus among cross-functional teams to achieve world-class results.

Cross-Functional Team Leadership | Strategic Planning | Project Management
Data Science | Bioinformatics | Computational Biology | Machine Learning | Clinical Research

name: Ohad Manor, PhD

title: Business Development Advisor
summary:
Paresh is a seasoned Global Category Manager and Supply Chain Leader with a passion for optimizing business processes to drive growth and success. He excels in assessing M&A market opportunities, supplier segmentation, trend identification, and developing Go-to-Market strategies. Paresh is dedicated to advancing digital sourcing and procurement transformation practices across both direct and indirect supply chain categories. His expertise spans SAAS-IT technology services, Retail & CPG, Advanced Manufacturing Industries, Consumer Electronics, Automotive, and Energy sectors.

Paresh thrives in fast-paced and challenging environments, where he leads, manages, and coaches peers while building strategic partnerships with C-suite stakeholders (SVP, EVP). He is adept at solving complex problems, enhancing capabilities, conducting Total Cost of Ownership (TCO) analyses, and spearheading impactful change management initiatives.

- Business strategy and development experience from top-tier management consulting firm McKinsey & Company
- Extensive experience in operational excellence within SAAS-IT, Advanced Manufacturing, Semiconductors, Automotive, Healthcare, and Retail & CPG sectors, managing direct/indirect spend, end-to-end transformation, and implementation
- Expertise in developing Center of Excellence (COE) playbooks, contract negotiation strategies, and supplier relationship management with a proven track record
- Quick learner who rapidly understands and evaluates environments, industries, and business opportunities, adding value to teams and organizations swiftly
- Skilled in creative problem-solving, strategy, operations, team and project management, modeling and analytics, and market evaluation
- Recognized team leader with strong coaching and mentoring skills
- Experienced in managing relationships and influencing executives, front-line staff, and peers
- Passionate about capability building, TCO, and change management

"Every Challenge is an Opportunity."

Key Strengths:

- Business Strategy
- Category Management
- Advanced e-Sourcing (Coupa Architect)
- RFX
- End-to-End Procurement Transformation
- Negotiation Excellence
- Implementation
- Business Strategy & Operations
titleDescription: Advisory support in crafting and executing comprehensive go-to-market strategies, refining customer engagement approaches, and bolstering Decode Age's competitive stance in the nutrient-based supplement industry in the U.S.
name: Paresh Patel

title: Advocate
summary:
I am Advocate Suman Jain, the founder of All About Law – Solutions to All Legal Work, a legal consultancy firm committed to simplifying complex legal challenges for individuals, startups, and businesses.

With a rich background in intellectual property law, labour law compliance, and startup registrations, I aim to provide practical and effective legal solutions. From trademark registrations and labour law compliance to company incorporation and litigation, I handle an array of legal services with precision and diligence.

Key Expertise:

Intellectual Property: Trademark, copyright, and design registrations
Labour Law: ESIC, PF, and labour-related litigation
Startup Compliance: Company incorporation and regulatory adherence
Litigation: Consumer cases, cheque bounce matters, and recovery disputes
Family Law: Divorce, marriage registration, and succession certificates
My approach revolves around a deep understanding of client needs and providing solutions that are not only legally sound but also strategically advantageous. I am passionate about assisting startups in their growth journey and ensuring businesses comply with ever-evolving legal requirements.

Let’s connect and explore how I can assist you or your business with tailored legal solutions.
name: Suman Jain, Advocate
